intro: Varronia stenostachya, commonly known as the narrow-stalked varronia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and narrow, lance-shaped leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream sides. Varronia stenostachya is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
